video.title: Some Assembly Required
video.synopsis: A 14-year-old takes ownership of a toy company and hires a group of his friends to help him create amazing new toys.

episodes.synopsis: Jarvis becomes the owner of Knickknack Toys and hires five high school friends to help create and test their first new toy: the Strong Suit.
episodes.title: Strong Suit

episodes.synopsis: Jarvis and his team go undercover at Melody Burger to convince the owner they have the best kids' meal toy for the fast food restaurant.
episodes.title: Philharmonica

episodes.synopsis: After Jarvis discovers Piper performing a love song about him, Piper calls on Aster to help her concoct a story that covers up her feelings.
episodes.title: Pants Full of Ants

episodes.synopsis: The Knickknack team creates a Web show to promote their new toy, the Rainbow Bunny, after Geneva accidentally orders a million of them.
episodes.title: Rainbow Bunny

episodes.synopsis: Jarvis and his friends discover a strange man inside the building who claims to be company founder, P. Everett Knickknack.
episodes.title: Kick the Can

episodes.synopsis: It's Valentine's Day, so Piper invents a toy that makes anyone hit with it fall in love. Jarvis is her first target, but maybe the toy works too well.
episodes.title: Cupid's Bow

episodes.synopsis: Jarvis and Piper each create songs for a new video game, but when P. Everett Knickknack tests them out, his dancing turns deadly.
episodes.title: Dance Crew Evolution

episodes.synopsis: Piper thinks Knickknack's Angie doll promotes an unreasonable standard of beauty, so Jarvis holds a beauty contest to come up with a new design.
episodes.title: Angie

episodes.synopsis: Geneva creates a terrible toy to represent Knickknack at the Toy Innovator Awards, and Bowie discovers Candace has a plan to steal the toy idea.
episodes.title: Snack-In-The-Box

episodes.synopsis: Bowie's newest invention allows kids to control video games with their minds. But when Jarvis gives it a try, things go dreadfully wrong.
episodes.title: Lobster Trap

episodes.synopsis: A kid claims that a Knickknack chemistry set blew up his family's house, so Jarvis moves them into the company building -- plus all their relatives.
episodes.title: Teeny Toddler Chemistry Set

episodes.synopsis: Bowie becomes the new boss of Knickknack Toys after he wins a lawsuit, but he soon turns the relaxed company vibe into a stuffy corporate atmosphere.
episodes.title: Moosetrap

episodes.synopsis: Mrs. Bubkes gets recruited into the Meeskatanian Army, but Jarvis and Piper try to get her out of it. Meanwhile, Bowie has flying bicycle trouble.
episodes.title: Flycycle

episodes.synopsis: Geneva strikes a deal to sell the puppets for a popular kids show, but Jarvis's fear of puppets causes some tangles.
episodes.title: Ricky Van Felt

episodes.synopsis: Piper creates a new game for GameCon and gets Jarvis and Bowie to dress up as characters and fight to promote it. But is the fight more than an act?
episodes.title: Flyrates

episodes.synopsis: Candace steals the Knickknack Fat Cat Tournament cash and locks it in a safe deposit box. The team has to break into a bank to steal it back.
episodes.title: Fat Cat

episodes.synopsis: When the team pitches ideas for a new line of action hero toys, they reveal each of their ideas of what a superhero -- and super-villain -- should be.
episodes.title: Sidekick

episodes.synopsis: Jarvis mistakenly exposes a magician's trick and attracts the wrath of an army of magicians. His only hope is to pull off an amazing trick of his own.
episodes.title: Presto Pack

episodes.synopsis: Geneva throws her Sweet Fifteen birthday party at Knickknack Toys, but when she doesn't invite Bowie, Jarvis vows to sneak him in.
episodes.title: Very Scary Fairy Tales

episodes.synopsis: Piper defeats the world's greatest online gamer, Alphadog, who turns up at Knickknack Toys and surprises everyone by catching the eye of Jarvis.
episodes.title: Realm of Raiders

episodes.synopsis: When a little girl saves a life with a toy designed while Candace was in charge, Candace sees it as an opportunity to reclaim Knickknack Toys.
episodes.title: Dr. Knickknack's Medical Bag

episodes.synopsis: Pop star Caden Clark hides from fans in Knickknack Toys and becomes so addicted to a video game that he might miss his own concert.
episodes.title: Pop Superstar

episodes.synopsis: Jarvis dreams up the greatest toy ever while napping, but forgets what it is upon waking. The team tries recreating his day exactly to jog his memory.
episodes.title: Gizmospinatron

episodes.synopsis: The gang is given a tough choice after their perpetual motion machine, Mmmboing, bounces into Prime Minister Davenport on national TV.
episodes.title: Mmmbomb

episodes.synopsis: Jarvis gets two tickets to the Super Bowl, so Piper, Bowie, Geneva and Knox fight over the chance to be Jarvis's date to the big game.
episodes.title: Everyball

episodes.synopsis: In an attempt to discover exactly how Jarvis feels about her, Piper tells him that she's thinking about leaving Knickknack Toys.
episodes.title: Junior Fish Gutter
